posts.post_content:
Looking to buy or trade for improved versions of these T205 , generally looking for SGC 40-50-60 grades or higher.

Bergen

Dickson

Devore

Egan 


I am *only* interested in SGC slabbed cards for this project,  no raw, PSA or other. I have a lot of T205 dupes, most slabbed, most low-mid grade. I can add cash or buy outright.
Please send scans with your offer if you can.
Let’s see what’s out there!
